g.text: Data after going though Data Gateway is wrapped
inside an Environment Message, this message is
'open' so that data can be accessed. Then, once
the work is done the message is 'sealed', routing
keys are changed and the message is sent.
For brevity this process is not detailed everywhere
as the body of an HTTP POST
to the defined mapper for the
type of device that sent the data
to the defined script for the
type of device that sent the data
if it is valid or not
data has gps, air humidity and
